1.content:
*Overlord*
You have a choice, I’ve picked 5 locations with strong enough firepower or population to aid us. Choose wisely, some will have more benefits than others.
1.title: Where do you land?

11.content: Your vessel is supposed to land near Fort Bragg, the largest military base in the country. On your way you hit an asteroid and spiral out of control and have no control of where you land. Where do you land
11.title: USA

114.content:
You hit the ground forcefully and get dazed for a second. You lay in the meteor and wait for someone to come by. You thought this would be a quick process and would be found quick, but it seemed like nobody was around when you crashed. Almost a week goes by and you think this could be compromising the mission at this point, so you push and push through the leave and sticks until you get into a flat surface that seemed like a path. You wait almost another day, but hear footsteps walk past you, then another set a minute later, then another about a minute after that... but they stop next to you. It seemed the meteor was making sounds like it was ready to eject, so there must not be anyone else around. You see half of the vessel crack open and instantly see a mouth, so you jump into it. You tried to remember your training and went up but a huge scream startled you from your host. You quickly stick your tendrils into the brain and loose consciousness for a second, along with the human. You open your eyes and your on the ground. You see a boy about 8 years old run towards you that you know to be your twin brother. “Lucy, are you okay!?” Your brother like yelled out. “I’m fine, I just tripped and fell,” you said. “Come on, let’s catch up to mom and dad.”

You realize that in about a minute you obtained all the memory and knowledge your host has. Your an 8 year old girl named Lucy who was on a hike with her family. You had a twin brother, older sister and older brother that moved out. You went to Oakville Elementary and lived about an hour out of Portland. You knew exactly how to act like an 8 year old girl, and could easily pull it tart the off for at least a week. You know you had to get to some food to start the breeding process, so you caught up with your parents and tried what you could.
“Honey, are you okay? I heard you scream,” your dad said.
“I’m fine, I just tripped on a stick and got scared. How much longer is the trail?”
“Like half a mile honey, why you ask?” your mom asks.
“I’m starving, can we stop somewhere on the way back?”
“Sure honey, we can stop at McDonalds on the way back,” says mom.

You’d parents are very lenient about teaching healthy eating. Your dad was fat but your mom stayed in shape, but she would rather see her kids fat than anorexic. You could see it in your siblings though, with your older brother getting fat after college and your older sister has started to get chubby since getting to high school. You could see her panting on the way to the car after we got off the path, even though 2 years ago she wouldn’t have broken a sweat. You get in the car and all you can think about is eating. When you get to McDonalds, you ask for 2 Big Macs and a large fry. You parents look at you in shock.
“You think you can even eat that much honey?”, your dad says.
“Yes I promise, I’ll eat all of it.”
Your dad shrugs and orders what you want. When you get your bag you shove a handful of fries into your mouth. This is the first time trying human food, but you had all the taste palates and memories of it from Lucy. You open your Big Mac box and take a huge bite of it. Before you can even finish swallowing it, you take another. Within a minute the whole sandwich is gone and you go for the other one while letting out a huge burp. You finish all your food before getting half way home, and are just as hungry as before. You knew it was gunna sound weird, but you ask if your parents can stop again since your still hungry.
“How are you still hungry after that? That would fill me up,” your dad says.
Your mom intervenes “Well is she’s hungry we can get something else. She could be having a growth spurt and needs the calories.”

You stop at Taco Bell on the way home and get a Double Chalupa and 3 Doritos Tacos. You could easily eat more, but knew your parents would say no anyway. Once you get it you start ripping into the bag and eat a taco before even leaving the parking lot. Once you get home the food is already finished, and your still as hungry as before. You get home and watch cartoons in your room for hours and are surprised you still enjoyed them. You realize even though you have full control, you still have her attributes and enjoy the things she did. After waiting a few hours, you feel a squirming in your stomach. Your confused at first, but realize it’s the first of your offspring growing. Your glad, but realize you should speed up the process by eating more. You wait till your parents are asleep and take your moms credit card out of her wallet. You walk to the closest convenience store since you don’t know how to drive, and look for the most fatty and calorie filled foods you can. First you grab a gallon of chocolate milk, then get bags of candy, cookies, iced cream, hot pockets, panned cakes, and chips. The total came to $67, but you thought by the time your mom would find out you would have already converted her. When you leave the store you start chugging the chocolate milk since you can’t hide that in your room. After chugging, you look at her bottle and notice it’s half gone. You’ve seen people puke before drinking less than you just did, and you were still thirsty. You finish it before walking out of the stores sight and feel a little bloated. You look down and see your bloated stomach decrease by the second. You knew the offspring were growing and you felt more squirming from inside. On the way home you ate a bag of chips, pint of iced cream, and 5 candy bars. Then you get home, quietly bring your bags of food upstairs and eat the other iced cream before you go to bed.

The Next Day at School
——————————
The next day you get to school and feel good. Your in a better mood than you’ve ever been at school. You were at lunch, eating 4 pieces of pizza and 5 milk cartons. Your friends just stare at you in awe.
“If you don’t slow down your gunna get fat,” your friend Amy said.
“Don’t worry, I’ll burn it off quick,” you said with a smirk.
“I bet you don’t, your gunna get fat just like Hannah,” Amy said.
Hannah started tearing up and left the table. lol you could think of was not being able to wait to get a host inside Amy. You instantly feel nauseous and run to the bathroom to puke. You go to a stall and try to throw up, when a breeder host comes out of your mouth and into the toilet. You grab it and put it in your pocket. This is the first offspring you’ve been able to produce, but in this young body who knows how long till you can make another. Who do you want to use it on?
114.title: A forest in Oregon

1142.content:
You walk up to the head lunch lady and ask her to talk to her in private. She was already a big lady, so she would be able to produce spawn quickly. You go into a side study room and lock the door behind you. “What did you want to talk about honey?”, the lady asked. You take the breeder out of your pocket and throw it at her face. It gets to her mouth when she starts screaming, but luckily the windows are sound proof since it’s got studying. Before she can get to the door and unlock it, she falls to the ground and starts convulsing. After about 30 seconds, she gets up and looks around.

Lucy: How do you feel? Are you in full control?
Lunch Lady: I’m starving.. but I seem to be linked with her brain.
Lucy: Great. I want you to eat as much as you can to produce enough spawn to control all the lunch lady’s by lunch tomorrow. You all should have enough spawn by Friday to disperse to the whole 5th grade. When they can, they will infect the 4th grade, then you get the idea.
Lunch Lady: Of coarse, let me get to it then.

She leaves the room and goes back to the kitchen. You look through a window and see her eating a whole tray of taco meat, chugging a gallon of milk as well. You knew your plan was coming together nicely, and it was only a matter of time before your whole school could infect their families. At this rate the county should be controlled mostly by us in a few weeks, then the state. One thing you knew though was you needed a new body, one that could produce spawn faster. After you get home you decide to switch, but with who?
1142.title: The head lunch lady

11422.content:
You go to school 1 week later with 3 spawn in your stomach, and have been eating as much as possible to produce more. You ask your mom to take you to school early because your science teacher said she would do private sessions. You get to Mrs. Cooper’s room and sit down, facing each other. She goes on for about 10 minutes, then she looked up and your half poking out of Lucy’s mouth. She screams as you jump from Lucy to Sally’s mouth, stopping her scream for the meantime. You go up to her brain while the new breeder controls Lucy and tackles Sally. You connect to her brain and go blank for a second.

You open your eyes and see Lucy, realizing you were linked in. You get up and get your batting’s with your new body.

Lucy: How do you feel.
Sally: Much better, sorry your stuck in that body.
Lucy: It’s fine, I’ll have a long life. And can also say I was here for the beginning of our new world...
Sally: Of coarse, What spawn do you have in you?
Lucy: One soldier and 2 breeders.
Sally: Give me one of each, use the last breeder for whoever you want.
Lucy: I have just the idea..

You go to the cafeteria and see the lunch lady's. Most of them were feasting on the leftovers from yesterday, and some were working out. You walk up to the head lunch lady to discuss the plan.

Sally: Are we ready.
Lunch lady: Almost, the only think is Kirsten isn’t controlled and is starting to suspect something. We can’t get close enough to get a bug in her mouth before running away.
Sally: Gabby and Madeline, it’s time for some lunch.

The two soldiers go over to the meat locker where she was and slammed the door. You heard mufflers screaming for a few seconds, but it was short lived. You open the door and her body was in pieces, but was getting eaten and cleaned up quickly. The plan should work today.

You go to your classroom and wait for 2 students in specific to show up. One was a huge kid in the 4th grade that could really utilize the soldier, and the mayor of
11422.title: Teacher

info.brief_description: You are a breeder type alien sent to earth to control as many people as possible.
info.description:
*A message from the overlord of your race*
Your being sent to earth to control a human, breed, and spread our race secretly until we have enough on our side. Once enough are on our side, our warships will be sent in with more breeders and soldiers to take the rest of the planet. We lost a critical amount of firepower and troops, so we will need at least a whole continent and it’s armies to help is in the fight. It’s imperative that you accomplish this in a year, because you won’t have any communication with your race once you get to earth and we can’t wait that long for more resources.
To control humans, you must control the brain. Once you find one alone, go into its mouth to the back of its throat, and go up to the brain. Spike your tendrils into it and you should assume full control of their memories and motor skills. You are a queen breeder, which is why we sent you; one of the last of our colony. This means you have the power to leave a baby in our host and control another whenever you want. Make sure you do though, because when you disconnect from a human without a baby attached, the human dies and cannot be controlled again. You can produce breeders and soldiers, which each come with their own physical and emotional changes. Soldiers will get aggressive and serious over time. All they are trained to care about is becoming imposing and hating humans. Soldiers will organically become more strong over time, but also work out allot to accelerate the effect. They can gain up to 20 pounds of muscle in a month depending on the host. They also develop retractable teeth behind their original ones that are sharp as blades, and can detach their jaws to take huge bites. Soldiers are carnivores, and can eat other people for more nutrients. The breeders will have almost the opposite effect, being more relaxed and friendly I’ver time. Their goal is to get alone with as many people as possible and spread the species. Breeders will also gain weight rapidly and have to eat a lot to feed the offspring. Some big hosts can hold around 20 to 30 babies at a time. They can also spew a gas out of their mouth to knock people out. Either can control any gender.
You are also responsible of organizing everybody and making sure the spread is quiet and efficient. You can subject other hosts to coordinate things, just make sure they’re smart and have a few month mature breeder or soldier. You can also assign what baby will go to what host.
You will be sent in a small meteorite that won’t be opened until your alone. It will take a couple days to create babies, so stay in secret. I’m counting... We’re, counting on you. Most don’t want to say it, but I believe your our species last hope. Don’t let us down.
